item.title: AI spending wasn't the biggest engine of U.S. economic growth in 2025, despite popular assumptions
item.description: The GDP value of AI is smaller than it might appear given that a lot of high-tech equipment is imported, according to a recent MRB Partners report.

item.title: Trump withdraws 'Board of Peace' invitation to Carney in widening rift with Canada
item.description: Trump said he has withdrawn the invitation to Canada to join the new Board of Peace, days after Carney warned against economic coercion by superpowers...

item.title: Fed's main gauge shows inflation at 2.8% in November, edging further away from target
item.description: Inflation drifted slightly further from the Federal Reserve's target in November though in line with expectations.

item.title: 'Nobody’s going to believe him': Trump’s Greenland 'deal' sparks relief — and confusion
item.description: Trump said he had the "concept of a deal" on Greenland, but didn't share details of the agreement — or who agreed to it.

item.title: China's investment crash raises credit risks for homebuilders, banks, government: Fitch
item.description: China’s sharp investment downturn is amplifying credit risks across the economy, weighing on the credit profiles of homebuilders, banks and local gove...
